body: Guess he just have sex in the dream world
Unless that guy in the first story made dolls using the form of his lover half doll and this is his grandson.
This is not a sequel, this girl is really a doll so he can only interact with her in the dream world.

@Paokoko5030, as much as I could read it' s not the case. It's a separate story of a young man who was always fascinated with his grandfather's china-doll. After ten years of absence he returns to his grandfather's mansion to fulfill his doll fetish.  By using a magic censer obtained by a magician he enters a dreamworld inhabited by the doll and has sex with her. After he wakes up he has a tremendous case of post nut clearity. Overall similar character design of the doll/human and doll-fetish as subject but otherwise no direct connections.
Pardon me, but it is the sequel of 334150?
